item.description:
Energetic transmission from divine beings
with psychic medium Helene Olsen
Friday March 11, 7:30-9:00 p.m. $20
Open to all - no attendee limit.  Bring family& friends!

Who are you? Where are you?  Do things "happen" to you more than you consciously create them? Open your heart and mind to your own multi-dimensional existence as Helene discusses finding your own true self and creating the highest aspects for your life. This interactive event is meant to raise your vibration, inspire your next moves forward, and open you to your limitless nature. Divine beings will channel messages to the group through Helene. In addition, Helene has an amazing capacity as a conduit for Divine energy and will be allowing this magnificent energy to flow through her and extend to all in attendance. Please RSVP at www.AngelsLighthouse.com.
item.how_to_find_us: Enter at center of building next to H&R Block, go up one flight, then down the hall to the right. Located above Starbucks.
item.why: This interactive event is meant to raise your vibration, inspire your next moves forward, and open you to your limitless nature. Divine beings will channel messages to the group through Helene.
item.name: Energetic Transmission from Divine Beings with psychic medium Helene Olsen
